name: hectogram
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a unit of measurement equal to 100 grams: The tariff was set at $1.50 per hectogram of gold.
More examplesFewer examplesYour assignment is to collect objects weighing a gram, a decagram, a hectogram, and a kilogram.He weighed out a hectogram of candy.
